name: Jerry's Snow Cones
description:
W, A, S, D to move and mouse to look around.

E to interact and pick up items.

Help Jerry save himself from the heat. There are snow cones around to save him, but make sure to balance it out with spicy curry, or else he may freeze. Watch out for overheating if you eat too much spicy curry, but keep the heat up and you'll be able to move quickly around the level.

Good luck saving Jerry!

Added in a "heat" bar to make sure you can keep track of Jerry's body temperature. Also added semi-random spawn locations for items so that you will have to search for the snow cones and spicy curry each time.
